name: reverts when trying to transfer when paused
fullName: reverts when trying to transfer when paused
statusMessage: Wrong kind of exception received: expected 'Returned error: request to https://proxy.devnet.neonlabs.org/solana failed, reason: Client network socket disconnected before secure TLS connection was established' to equal 'ERC20Pausable: token transfer while paused'
statusTrace:

categories.name: Connection problem
categories.messageRegex: .*Error: ETIMEDOUT.*|.*ESOCKETTIMEDOUT.*|.*ECONNRESET.*|.*Client network socket disconnected before secure TLS connection was established.*|.*500 Internal Server Error.*nginx.*|.*Error: socket hang up.*
